comments.body: This is on the right hand side of a mutable field definition. The message is inconsistent.
The message says _as_ not _on_. So I think it's precise.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +18,22 @@10 |  var x6: Int = { uninitialized } // error
   |                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^
   |                  `uninitialized` can only be used as the right hand side of a mutable field definition
-- Error: tests/neg/i11225.scala:13:22 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
13 |    var cached: Int = uninitialized   // error
